extendedInfo.description: Sawtak is a product of Bright Creations and sponsored by Citjo - Citizen Journalism Hub of the middle east.  All data displayed in Sawtak is provided by the Ministry of State for Administrative Development (elections.eg). Sawtak provides you, as an Egyptian voter with objective information required to understand your role in the Egyptian Presidential Elections 2012. Based on your Egyptian identification number the application will provide you with the following:â¢       Your eligibility to voteâ¢       Location where you can voteâ¢       Lists of candidatesâ¢       Links to further information for the candidates Sawtak is designed & developed by Bright Creations - a software solutions provider specialising in providing customised and high quality solutions serving clients in Europe, North America, the Middle East & North Africa. Bright Creations, Citjo, and the Ministry of State for Administrative Development, do not in anyway imply support of any political party or individual in the Egyptian Elections process.  Information provided is a direct reflection of data received from elections.eg and has not been modified.  We do not store or cache any information related to your ID, or any other information related to your use of the application.  If you are using a mobile application, favorites and other items are only stored on your mobile phone handset.ØµÙØªÙ ÙÙ Ø§Ø­Ø¯Ù ÙÙØªØ¬Ø§Øª Ø´Ø±ÙØ© "Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙØª ÙØ±ÙØ´ÙØ²" ØªØ­Øª Ø±Ø¹Ø§ÙØ© Ø´Ø±ÙØ© Citjo.ÙÙ Ø§ÙØ¨ÙØ§ÙØ§Øª ÙØ§ÙÙØ¹ÙÙÙØ§Øª Ø§ÙÙØªØ§Ø­Ø© ÙÙ "ØµÙØªÙ" ØªÙØ¯ÙÙØ§ ÙØ²Ø§Ø±Ø© Ø§ÙØ¯ÙÙØ© ÙÙØªÙÙÙØ© Ø§ÙØ¥Ø¯Ø§Ø±ÙØ©. reviews.title: v good but please fix that
reviews.comment: performance is really good. easy to use, however please fix the following :  - Entering the national ID, a numeric keyboard would be much more easier. - Exit does not work ( HTC Desire S ), should press many times - Please add an exit menu item that can be called from anywhere and close all activities. - \330\261\331\202\331\205 \330\247\331\204\331\204\330\254\331\206\330\251 \330\247\331\204\331\201\330\261\330\271\331\212\330\251 \331\205\330\264 \331\205\331\210\330\254\331\210\330\257 ( \330\261\331\202\331\205 \330\247\331\204\330\265\331\206\330\257\331\210\331\202 ) - some information does not need my ID, it should be available at start activity before submitting the ID
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app but doesn\'t exit (galxy s2). Also the db is not updated with the names of the candidates for each constituencies. Fix and deserve the 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mohamed Farag
reviews.comment: Very good application,have more features than the original one developed by elections2011 site but it always fail to exit and more an iphone app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Helpful application....provides complete information about the elections
